Interface Faceable

public interface Faceable

Faces should be able to be drawn (onto a Graphics2D object), translated and rotated.

Author:
David Mutchler. Created December 10, 2009.

Method Summary
 void drawOn(Graphics2D graphics2)
          Draws the Faceable onto the given Graphics2D object.
 void rotate(double degreesToRotate)
          Rotates the Faceable by the given number of degrees.
 void translate(double translateX, double translateY)
          Translates the Faceable by the given amount.
 

Method Detail

drawOn

void drawOn(Graphics2D graphics2)
Draws the Faceable onto the given Graphics2D object.

Parameters:
graphics2 - Graphics object onto which to draw

translate

void translate(double translateX,
               double translateY)
Translates the Faceable by the given amount.

Parameters:
translateX - Amount to translate in the x direction
translateY - Amount to translate in the y direction

rotate

void rotate(double degreesToRotate)
Rotates the Faceable by the given number of degrees.

Parameters:
degreesToRotate - Number of degrees to rotate the Faceable (e.g. 180 to turn the Faceable upside down)
